Hello, you have got a Corgi!

Here is how you use can interact with the smart contract powering these Corgis. See below for a simple frontend for corgis with unique fur color!

To init:

          contract.init({initialOwner: nearlib.dev.myAccountId})

To create a Corgi

          contract.createRandomCorgi({name: "Winifred The Corgi King", seed: 1})

To send a Corgi:

          contract.transfer({to: 'bob.near', tokenId: 'a233safhj23'})
Loading...
